task.summary: Add initial configuration files for JavaScript libraries, Prettier, Qodana, and VCS

Remove .gitignore from functions and add Qodana SARIF file
The `.gitignore` file specific to the `functions` folder has been deleted. A new `qodana.sarif.json` file has been added, likely containing Qodana analysis results. Verify changes related to build processes and code quality configurations.
Update Firebase and TypeScript configurations, add dotenv dependency, and enhance chat interface

Update source map in index.js.map
The source map file for index.js has been modified to reflect changes in mappings, sources, and related metadata. These updates ensure alignment with the current state of the source code, improving debugging accuracy.

Add ESLint ignore file, update .gitignore, and refactor index.js for Telegram bot integration
- Created .eslintignore to exclude genkit.config.ts from linting. - Updated .gitignore to include additional patterns for environment files and IDE configurations. - Refactored index.js to improve Telegram bot integration, including error handling and logging enhancements. - Adjusted dotenv configuration for better environment variable management.

Refactor index.ts to integrate Express and improve tooling.
Implemented an Express server to handle Telegram webhooks and replaced polling with webhooks for better performance. Enhanced the Genkit setup with Vertex AI plugins and defined new tools for working with HLTV and Wikipedia APIs.

Remove frontend files for FURIA CS chatbot.
Deleted `index.html`, `script.js`, `styles.css`, and associated assets as they are no longer needed. This simplifies the project by removing unused frontend components.

Remove unused frontend files and refine backend logic
Deleted redundant frontend assets, including `index.html`, `script.js`, `styles.css`, and others, to streamline the project. Improved back-end code by adjusting async behavior, refining webhook handling, and enhancing error logging and response handling. Updated `package.json` with new build scripts for improved development workflow.

Refactor backend and streamline project setup
Improved Express webhook handling, added environment variable debugging, and refined error management. Updated `functions/package.json` to clean up scripts and dependencies, removing unused items. Adjusted various files to enhance code consistency, simplify logic, and align with best practices.

Refactor index.ts to enhance Express integration and improve error handling
- Updated environment variable loading and debugging. - Refined Redis client setup and error management. - Improved flow handling for Telegram bot interactions. - Streamlined tool definitions and execution logic for Genkit. - Cleaned up package.json dependencies and scripts.Remove compiled JavaScript files from the repository.
The `functions/lib/index.js` and `functions/lib/index.js.map` files have been deleted. These are likely build artifacts and should not be tracked in version control to prevent unnecessary clutter.

Refactor TypeScript configuration and workspace settings
- Updated tsconfig.json to improve module resolution and target version. - Enhanced workspace.xml to reflect changes in project structure and remove unnecessary entries.

Improve error handling and caching for FURIA roster fetch
Refactor `executeGetFuriaRoster` to include better error messages, especially for issues related to Cloudflare blocks. Add Redis caching for API responses to reduce load and improve efficiency. Enhance type imports and overall code readability.

MESSAGE.value: Add initial configuration files for JavaScript libraries, Prettier, Qodana, and VCS
Refactor HTML structure, enhance CSS styles, and update Qodana configuration

Remove .gitignore and add Qodana SARIF report.
Deleted the `.gitignore` file for the `functions/` folder, which included rules for dependencies, logs, and build output. Added a `qodana.sarif.json` file containing a detailed report of code quality analysis.

Remove .gitignore from functions and add Qodana SARIF file
The `.gitignore` file specific to the `functions` folder has been deleted. A new `qodana.sarif.json` file has been added, likely containing Qodana analysis results. Verify changes related to build processes and code quality configurations.
Update Firebase and TypeScript configurations, add dotenv dependency, and enhance chat interface

Update `index.js.map` source mapping
This change modifies the mapping configuration in `index.js.map` to align with updated source paths and mapping settings. It ensures accurate source mapping for troubleshooting and debugging.

Update source map in index.js.map
The source map file for index.js has been modified to reflect changes in mappings, sources, and related metadata. These updates ensure alignment with the current state of the source code, improving debugging accuracy.

Add ESLint ignore file, update .gitignore, and refactor index.js for Telegram bot integration
- Created .eslintignore to exclude genkit.config.ts from linting. - Updated .gitignore to include additional patterns for environment files and IDE configurations. - Refactored index.js to improve Telegram bot integration, including error handling and logging enhancements. - Adjusted dotenv configuration for better environment variable management.
Refactor index.ts to integrate Express server for Telegram webhooks and enhance Genkit with Vertex AI tools

Refactor index.ts to integrate Express and improve tooling.
Implemented an Express server to handle Telegram webhooks and replaced polling with webhooks for better performance. Enhanced the Genkit setup with Vertex AI plugins and defined new tools for working with HLTV and Wikipedia APIs.
Update workspace.xml to include new public assets and adjust task configurations

Remove frontend files for FURIA CS chatbot.
Deleted `index.html`, `script.js`, `styles.css`, and associated assets as they are no longer needed. This simplifies the project by removing unused frontend components.

Refactor Express webhook handler and update project files
Simplified the Express webhook handler by improving response flow and logging clarity. Added a frontend cleanup task to workspace.xml and removed unused frontend files. Updated package.json to fix script duplication in the "build" command.

Remove unused frontend files and refine backend logic
Deleted redundant frontend assets, including `index.html`, `script.js`, `styles.css`, and others, to streamline the project. Improved back-end code by adjusting async behavior, refining webhook handling, and enhancing error logging and response handling. Updated `package.json` with new build scripts for improved development workflow.

Refactor backend and streamline project setup
Improved Express webhook handling, added environment variable debugging, and refined error management. Updated `functions/package.json` to clean up scripts and dependencies, removing unused items. Adjusted various files to enhance code consistency, simplify logic, and align with best practices.

Remove compiled JavaScript files from the repository
Deleted auto-generated JavaScript files (`index.js` and `index.js.map`) from the `functions/lib` directory. These files are likely part of the build output and should not be tracked in version control.

Refactor index.ts to enhance Express integration and improve error handling
- Updated environment variable loading and debugging. - Refined Redis client setup and error management. - Improved flow handling for Telegram bot interactions. - Streamlined tool definitions and execution logic for Genkit. - Cleaned up package.json dependencies and scripts.Remove compiled JavaScript files from the repository.
The `functions/lib/index.js` and `functions/lib/index.js.map` files have been deleted. These are likely build artifacts and should not be tracked in version control to prevent unnecessary clutter.

Refactor TypeScript configuration and workspace settings
- Updated tsconfig.json to improve module resolution and target version. - Enhanced workspace.xml to reflect changes in project structure and remove unnecessary entries.

Improve error handling and caching for FURIA roster fetch
Refactor `executeGetFuriaRoster` to include better error messages, especially for issues related to Cloudflare blocks. Add Redis caching for API responses to reduce load and improve efficiency. Enhance type imports and overall code readability.
